I create this repository to develop a (possibly minimal) quarto template in typst for ZHAW Student Thesis.

To create a quarto typst template, check out:

- [Typst Partials](https://quarto.org/docs/journals/templates.html#typst-partials)
- [Custom Typst Formats](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/typst-custom.html)

Here are some typst thesis templates that are interesting:

- [minimal-thesis-luebeck](https://typst.app/universe/package/minimal-thesis-luebeck): A minimalistic template for writing a thesis. The main objective of the template is to produce a nice document with as little code as possible. No nonsense, no extras.
- [aio-studi-and-thesis](https://typst.app/universe/package/aio-studi-and-thesis): All-in-one template for students and theses
